DOC.brief_summary: Polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) common endocrine disorder premenopausal woman . PCOS characterize increase level testosterone , unwanted hair growth , adiposity , irregular menstrual cycle , infertility . PCOS associate diabetes mellitus cardiovascular disease . Women PCOS report increased level stress hormone , may associate decreased quality life . Increased testosterone level woman may decrease risk osteoporosis . The aim present study measure level stress hormone urine describe quality life use questionnaire . In addition aim characterize body composition bone architecture use DXA ExtremeCT . As part project , Biobank fast blood sample participant establish .
DOC.brief_title: Characterization Prospective Cohort Women With PCOS
